Package org.carrot2.source.microsoft

Fetches documents from the Bing search engine using its publicly available API.

See: Description

    Class Description
    Bing3DocumentSource
    A base IDocumentSource sending requests to Bing Search API in Windows Azure Marketplace.

Package org.carrot2.source.microsoft Description

Fetches documents from the Bing search engine using its publicly available API.
